title: Chiefs quarterback Gardner Minshew hurts knee and leaves game
snippets: Kansas City's quarterback situation just got even worse
Gardner Minshew's knee injury gave way to Kansas City's third-string quarterback.

NASHVILLE, Tenn. — Kansas City Chiefs quarterback Gardner Minshew hurt his left knee Sunday in the second quarter against the Tennessee Titans and was ruled out for the rest of the game. Chris Oladokun replaced Minshew, who was making his first start this season for the Chiefs with Patrick Mahomes on injured reserve after tearing two knee ligaments last week. Minshew’s last play came on a safety when Titans defensive tackle Jeffery Simmons tackled Kareem Hunt in the end zone with 13:06 left in the second. Minshew finished 3 of 8 for 15 yards before his injury. When the Chiefs got the ball...

summary: Kansas City Chiefs quarterback Gardner Minshew injured his left knee in the second quarter against the Tennessee Titans and was ruled out for the rest of the game. Minshew was starting in place of Patrick Mahomes, who is on injured reserve with torn knee ligaments. Third-string quarterback Chris Oladokun replaced Minshew following the injury.

Sunday afternoon and the final Bundesliga game before the winter break has been and gone with 17th placed Heidenheim having hoped to cause a major upset in hosting league leaders Bayern Munich.Despite...

summary: Bayern Munich, the Bundesliga leaders, played their final league match before the 2025 winter break against 17th-placed Heidenheim. Heidenheim aimed for an upset but Bayern maintained their top position. The match concluded the first half of the Bundesliga season for both teams.

title: Nuremberg movie and Freddy sequel come to streaming this week
snippets: "Nuremberg," a World War II era historical drama starring Russell Crowe and Rami Malek, is reportedly coming to digital streaming this week. Find out when and where the film is available to watch at home.
The sequel to the hit video game adaptation of “Five Nights at Freddy’s” is reportedly coming to digital streaming this week. Find out when and where you can stream the movie at home.
titles: Russell Crowe’s ‘Nuremberg’ New On Streaming This Week, Report Says

summary: The World War II drama "Nuremberg," starring Russell Crowe and Rami Malek, and the sequel to the video game adaptation "Five Nights at Freddy’s" are both set to become available on digital streaming this week. Viewers can check streaming platforms for release dates and availability.
